languages.text: "Его тронула скверна. Я не могу допустить его на свой корабль. Пусть сам ищет путь к спасению".

traits.locale_text: "Его тронула скверна. Я не могу допустить его на свой корабль. Пуст сам ищет путь к спасению".

languages.text: "He has been tainted by corruption. I cannot allow him on my ship. He can seek out his own path to salvation."
languages.original_text: "Его тронула скверна. Я не могу допустить его на свой корабль. Пусть сам ищет путь к спасению".

traits.locale_text: "He has been tainted by corruption. I cannot allow him on my ship. He can seek out his own path to salvation."
"He has been tainted by corruption. I cannot allow him on my ship. He can seek out his own path to salvation."
"He has been tainted by corruption. I cannot allow him on my ship. He can seek out his own path to salvation."
"He has been tainted by corruption. I cannot allow him on my ship. He can seek out his own path to salvation."

languages.text: “他已经被腐化玷污，我不能让他上我的船。他可以自行寻找属于他的救赎之路。”
languages.original_text: "He has been tainted by corruption. I cannot allow him on my ship. He can seek out his own path to salvation."

traits.locale_text: “他已经被腐化玷污，我不能让他上我的船。他可以自行寻找属于他的救赎之路。”

languages.text: «Está mancillado por la corrupción; no puedo permitir que suba a mi nave. Es libre de buscar su propio camino a la salvación».
languages.original_text: "He has been tainted by corruption. I cannot allow him on my ship. He can seek out his own path to salvation."

traits.locale_text: «Está mancillado por la corrupción; no puedo permitir que suba a mi nave. Es libre de buscar su propio camino a la salvación».

languages.text: 「彼は腐敗にまみれている。{mf|俺|私}の船に乗せることはできない。自分で救いの道を探すこともできるだろう」
languages.original_text: "He has been tainted by corruption. I cannot allow him on my ship. He can seek out his own path to salvation."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は腐敗にまみれている。{mf|俺|私}の船に乗せることはできない。自分で救いの道を探すこともできるだろう」

languages.text: "Die Korruption hat ihn befleckt. Ich kann ihn nicht auf meinem Schiff dulden. Er soll seinen eigenen Weg zur Erlösung suchen."
languages.original_text: "He has been tainted by corruption. I cannot allow him on my ship. He can seek out his own path to salvation."

traits.locale_text: "Die Korruption hat ihn befleckt. Ich kann ihn nicht auf meinem Schiff dulden. Er soll seinen eigenen Weg zur Erlösung suchen."

languages.text: « La corruption l'a souillé. Je ne peux pas l'accueillir à bord de mon vaisseau. Il devra trouver seul la voie du salut. »
languages.original_text: "He has been tainted by corruption. I cannot allow him on my ship. He can seek out his own path to salvation."

traits.locale_text: « La corruption l'a souillé. Je ne peux pas l'accueillir à bord de mon vaisseau. Il devra trouver seul la voie du salut. »

languages.text: "Yozlaşmış birini gemime alamam. Kurtuluşa giden yolu kendi bulmalı."
languages.original_text: "He has been tainted by corruption. I cannot allow him on my ship. He can seek out his own path to salvation."

traits.locale_text: "Yozlaşmış birini gemime alamam. Kurtuluşa giden yolu kendi bulmalı."
